amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to decrease the salary of Kenneth L Wainstein, Secretary of Homeland Security for Intelligence and Analysis to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 269 (Roll no. 451).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 269 (Roll no. 451).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
